Summary: Smooth pleasant flavor- better than VIA vanilla
text:
Generally I find that flavored coffees always seem to smell better than they taste. It seems like the special flavor disappears once they are brewed. And, I have to admit, I threw out the first pot I brewed of the Starbucks Natural Fusions Vanilla because it was too bland. So when I made the next pot, I added an extra tablespoon of coffee and that made all the difference. The vanilla scent is very natural and not perfume-y, and the vanilla flavor is nice, but not overpowering. Add a little milk and sugar and it's a special treat. I much prefer this to the VIA vanilla packets which, although more convenient, are too strong-flavored and too sweet for me.

Bottom line: if you like flavored coffee that is subtle, but well-balanced, this is a good one to purchase. Just be prepared to add an extra tablespoon or so when you make it.
